nodes.text: Star Wars: The Dark Side is a canon reference book written by Tricia Barr that was published on December 6, 2018.

Do you want to know everything and more about the DARK SIDE of the Force? Open this book and discover throughout its 224 pages the data, details and rites or the symbology of the most hateful and evil gang in the galaxy. Enjoy the rigor of a text signed by Tricia Barr, one of the best specialists in this saga and author of several bestsellers about Star Wars, and dark, poetic and scary illustrations. Remind in passing the leaders who made their flag and way of life from EVIL. And remember, again, the complex and dramatic character of Darth Vader, one of the most fascinating and tormented in the history of cinema.

The book included new information surrounding the Inquisitorius, which according to Tricia Barr, came directly from the Lucasfilm Story Group in anticipation of forthcoming content, though she is unsure when that content will be released.
